name: SOLARITY PROTOTYPE
description:
This is a bare-bones RPG test to see if i'm comfortable with using GBStudio. The rooms are default in the program and the character models are made in 2BitCharactersGenerator.  Expect to see entirely different things in the first alpha release, so stay tuned! If anyone has any suggestions on what I could add in the first alpha, feel free to list them in the comments! Have a nice day!

CONTROLS

Z - Interact

Arrow Keys  - Move
